colorTheory.description: This color palette combines a classic black and white scheme with a vibrant teal accent color to create a professional yet visually appealing look.
colorTheory.mood: The colors convey a sense of professionalism, modernity, and trustworthiness.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between the black text and white background ensures excellent readability for all users.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The black primary color provides a strong foundation, complemented by the white secondary color for balance and the teal accent color for added visual interest.
